mapper.select:
select
from orgs where parent_id = 0 order by add_time desc

select
from orgs where parent_id > 0
and parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
order by add_time desc

select
from orgs where 1=1 and parent_id = 0
and org_id = #{searchOrgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
order by add_time desc
